integration.description: Analyze and understand threat infrastructure from a variety of sources-passive DNS, active DNS, WHOIS, SSL certificates and more-without devoting resources to time-intensive manual threat research and analysis.
integration.name: PassiveTotal v2 (Partner Contribution)
